info.name: Craftworks Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Craftworks backend with all endpoints including authentication, users, jobs (with enhanced search and filtering), quotes, invitations, notifications, services, real-time messaging, reviews & disputes, comprehensive wallet management, payment processing, admin payment dashboard, and withdrawal management. v2.3.0 Updates: Added automatic endDate calculation for jobs - When a craftsman is hired, the system automatically calculates and sets the job end date based on start date + duration according to job scope. End date is automatically updated when jobs are rescheduled. v2.2.0 Updates: Enhanced job creation with jobScope functionality - Added jobScope field that determines duration units for craftsman quotes. Clients specify job scope as 'small' (hours), 'medium' (days), or 'large' (weeks), which validates craftsman duration inputs accordingly. v2.1.0 Updates: Implemented a dynamic fee structure based on completed jobs count (0% for first job, gradually increasing to 5%), removed fee-config endpoints in favor of code-based fee management, added completed jobs tracking for both clients and craftsmen. v2.0.0 Updates: Major system enhancement with comprehensive wallet management - added job duration tracking, enhanced quote system with duration requirements, complete wallet system for craftsman income and withdrawals, admin payment dashboard with withdrawal processing.
